dict.acceptation: 通常，经常，平常，惯常地；一直，向来；动不动，一般；素；

sent.orig: Compare to life in, the matter usually met an antinomy, usually heart belligerence.
sent.trans: 好比人生中，往往会遇到矛盾之事，往往内心交战。

sent.orig: In papillary carcinoma, tumor usually concentrates radioiodine, but in follicular carcinoma, tumor usually concentrates pertechnetate.
sent.trans: 乳头状癌通常浓聚放射性碘，而滤泡状癌则浓聚高锝酸盐。

sent.orig: Females are usually less inhibited by new environments, so bitches are usually taken to the stud.
sent.trans: 由于母犬受环境因素的影响比较小，因此，一般交配时，母犬是被带至公犬处进行交配。

sent.orig: We don't usually go to the city; we usually go to Huntsville to shop.
sent.trans: 我们不经常去城市；我们通常去豪特威尔购物。

sent.orig: Alice usually plays at the park on Saturday. Ann usually make kites.
sent.trans: 艾丽斯通常星期六的时候在公园玩，安通常制作风筝。
